DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety tolerability increase dose level PF-04518600 alone combination wtih PF-05082566 patient select advanced metastatic carcinoma order determine maximum tolerate dose select recommend Phase 2 dose .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of OX40 Agonist PF-04518600 Alone And In Combination With 4-1BB Agonist PF-05082566
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) ( Parts A1 A2 ) , melanoma ( Parts A1 B1 ) , clear cell renal cell carcinoma ( RCC ) ( Part A1 ) , head neck squamous cell carcinoma ( HNSCC ) ( Parts B1 B2 ) , non small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) ( Parts B1 B2 ) , urothelial bladder carcinoma ( Part B1 ) , gastric squamous cell carcinoma uterine cervix ( Part B1 ) progress intolerant standard therapy , standard therapy available decline standard therapy . Performance Status 0 1 Adequate bone marrow , kidney liver function Brain metastases require steroid Major surgery , radiation therapy , systemic anticancer therapy within 4 week study treatment start ( 6 week mitomycin C nitrosoureas ) Active clinically significant bacterial , fungal , viral infection
